projects.description: A program that displays several pages of student data that the user can easily navigate and view using the pagination buttons. Additionally, the user can search for a specific student by name.

projects.description: A JavaScript enhanced form that is engaging, interactive, and easy to use. The focus is initially set for the user on the first input. Unnecessary fields are hidden unless they are needed based on user input. Conflicting options are prevented from being chosen. And helpful error messages are displayed when the user enters invalid information.

projects.description: A browser-based, word guessing game called 'Phrase Hunter'. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard or the physical keyboard. And fun animations help to indicate the correct and incorrect guesses.
image_urls: screenshot of the beginning of a game - a hidden phrase, alphabet of unsused keys and 5 lives remaining
screenshot of the middle of a game - a partially hidden phrase, alphabet of used and unused keys, 2 lives remaining
